item.title: Farm Site Selection
item.description: Choosing the right site for an outdoor cannabis farm in Michigan is crucial for maximizing plant health, yield, and quality. Factors such as climate, soil quality, sunlight exposure, and water availability all play a role in ensuring a successful harvest.
